name: Bob's Had Enough
description:
Story

Bob, an unstoppable serial killer, by trade and by hobby, was betrayed by the head administrator of the world’s mafia. He finally had enough. Now, go there and murder some foes as a walking cube with infinite ammo!

Controls

To move: W/ A/ S/ D

To shoot: Left Mouse Click

To reload: R

Team

Lucas Castro - Programmer

Pedro Salmaze - Programmer

Bernardo Maia - Programmer & 3D Artist

Tiago Freitas - Programmer

Bernardo Tameirão - Product Owner

Credits

Background music by Deep Forms

Enemy sound FX by Daniel SoundsGood

Shoot sound FX by Komposite Sound
